channel.title: [317] SaintzScape; The Server You Should Be Playing!
channel.description:
Welcome to SaintzScape; a unique and amazing 317 with a whole new adventure in store for you! We pride ourselves in all working skills and a balanced economy, we also have a dedicated staff team that interacts with the community in and out of game via Forums! You can often catch the Developers and Administrators mingling with the regular players in-game often times having a lot of fun and doing what they do best; manage an amazing server!
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/30cve6g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/iveek6.png[/img] These are our amazing donation shops with many rare and high valued items; many cosmetics and a whole lot of amazing and useful gear and items!
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/xdhukn.png[/img] This is SaintzScape's very unique revenant area spread out in a high level wilderness zone!
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/2wovlg3.png[/img] Ever have trouble finding your teleports in other servers? Well not here because we have a very unique and user-friendly teleport system that teleports you anywhere you may need to go!
[IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2ih8qyw.png[/img] Along with every other unique quality of the server we have a very easy to track point system located in the quest tab; this tab shows a lot of server information including: playtime, amount donated, a point tracking system, server information and even server links to forums, donation, voting, and much more!
[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/339kpk0.png[/img] Located right next to our user-friendly information tab we have our achievement tab which holds over 100 unique achievements that give you a little something extra to do!
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/24v0cue.png[/img] Ever get tired of a fixed gaming screen? Worry no more, Saintzscape offers a resizeable client mode and a full screen mode to fit your style of gameplay; with these settings also come a little bit of client customization!
[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/24wrbwm.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/1zo7z9d.png[/img] Ever been told you could shoot for the stars? Well now you can do that by hunting down the fallen stars and mine them for stardust!! After obtaining this stardust you are able to go to the stardust shop located at home to turn it in for amazing cosmetics and gear!!
[IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2wegkdw.png[/img] Tired of the same old dull Double experience weekend? Ever have so much cash you didn't know what to do with it? Well no worries!! SaintzScape offers you an alternative with a working Well of Goodwill, this well will accept donations of up to 100M in exchange for 2 hours of 30% bonus experience; this can also be stacked with your voting scroll's 10 minute 30% bonus experience! Talk about getting your money's worth!!
[IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/333bymf.png[/img] With all of this amazing content we also offer fully functioning skills!! (I am not much of a skiller but every skill does work haha) With an experience cap of 1 billion experience for every skill you can never get bored!!
So what are you waiting for?? Come and join us here at [url=http://www.saintzscape.com/forum/]Play SaintzScape Now - Where Players Become Saints[/url] , download the client at [url=http://saintzscape.com/download/]Saintzscape - #1 RSPS[/url] We hope to see you soon!! And tell them Jigg sent ya ;D

item.title: [317] SaintzScape; The Server You Should Be Playing!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:2, topic:555591”]the first two pics are related to donations… that’s how you know shit is going downhill.

Might want to include more media and show what sets your server aside. Apart from that, good luck![/quote]
Not only that, they’re littered with:

Jigg:

These are our amazing donation shops with many rare and high valued items; many cosmetics and a whole lot of amazing and useful gear and items!

A.K.A: spend money on our server to get ahead.
And that type of server isn’t fun to play.

Plus it doesn’t even sound like they had permission to post this.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] SaintzScape; The Server You Should Be Playing!

item.title: [317] SaintzScape; The Server You Should Be Playing!
item.dc:creator: @Jigg Jigg
item.description:
@Jigg wrote:

Welcome to SaintzScape; a unique and amazing 317 with a whole new adventure in store for you! We pride ourselves in all working skills and a balanced economy, we also have a dedicated staff team that interacts with the community in and out of game via Forums! You can often catch the Developers and Administrators mingling with the regular players in-game often times having a lot of fun and doing what they do best; manage an amazing server!

30cve6g.png773×535

iveek6.png771×534

These are our amazing donation shops with many rare and high valued items; many cosmetics and a whole lot of amazing and useful gear and items!

xdhukn.png767×525

This is SaintzScape’s very unique revenant area spread out in a high level wilderness zone!


Ever have trouble finding your teleports in other servers? Well not here because we have a very unique and user-friendly teleport system that teleports you anywhere you may need to go!


Along with every other unique quality of the server we have a very easy to track point system located in the quest tab; this tab shows a lot of server information including: playtime, amount donated, a point tracking system, server information and even server links to forums, donation, voting, and much more!


Located right next to our user-friendly information tab we have our achievement tab which holds over 100 unique achievements that give you a little something extra to do!


Ever get tired of a fixed gaming screen? Worry no more, Saintzscape offers a resizeable client mode and a full screen mode to fit your style of gameplay; with these settings also come a little bit of client customization!


Ever been told you could shoot for the stars? Well now you can do that by hunting down the fallen stars and mine them for stardust!! After obtaining this stardust you are able to go to the stardust shop located at home to turn it in for amazing cosmetics and gear!!


Tired of the same old dull Double experience weekend? Ever have so much cash you didn’t know what to do with it? Well no worries!! SaintzScape offers you an alternative with a working Well of Goodwill, this well will accept donations of up to 100M in exchange for 2 hours of 30% bonus experience; this can also be stacked with your voting scroll’s 10 minute 30% bonus experience! Talk about getting your money’s worth!!


With all of this amazing content we also offer fully functioning skills!! (I am not much of a skiller but every skill does work haha) With an experience cap of 1 billion experience for every skill you can never get bored!!

So what are you waiting for?? Come and join us here at Play SaintzScape Now - Where Players Become Saints , download the client at Saintzscape - #1 RSPS
We hope to see you soon!! And tell them Jigg sent ya ;D

Read full topic
